justification: “We also examined trait emotion regulation reported in the Emotion Regulation Questionnaire (ERQ).”

measured_by: fMRI activation in dorsomedial prefrontal cortex (dmPFC) and dorsolateral prefrontal cortex (dlPFC) during RETHINK trials
justification: “The non-BMX group showed greater activation than the BMX group in the dmPFC and dlPFC during the application of reappraisal to regulate negative emotions elicited by BC-related pictures.”
construct: Emotion regulation ability during breast-cancer related stimuli

measured_by: Self-reported negativity rating (1–5 scale) after RETHINK trials of the Emotion Regulation Task
justification: “At the end of a trial, participants self-reported how negative they were feeling on a scale of 1-5… these self-report regulation measures were compared between… groups.”

measured_by: fMRI activation in ventromedial prefrontal cortex (vmPFC), posterior cingulate cortex (PCC), and precuneus during BC-watch trials
justification: “For the BC-IAPS differential reactivity, patient participants showed greater activation in the Default Mode Network… including vmPFC, PCC, and a precuneus-cuneus cluster than healthy controls.”
construct: Emotional reactivity to breast-cancer related images

measured_by: Self-reported negativity rating (1–5 scale) after WATCH trials of IAPS and BC pictures
justification: “BC patients reported more similar emotional reactivity to BC-related and general emotionally negative images than did controls,” referring to the self-report negativity ratings collected after WATCH trials.
